snippet.title: 🚨 Gameplay Premiere! Farming Simulator 22 in action (Pt.1)
snippet.description:
Watch the first of two gameplay videos we revealed at FarmCon! 

QA Lead Ken Burgess and Gameplay Developer Stefan Maurus from GIANTS Software take a look at some interesting new details you'll find in Farming Simulator 22. Most of them previously not announced. More info and brand-new screenshots on our blog!

► https://farming-simulator.com/newsArticle.php?&news_id=247

Farming Simulator 22 releases on November 22nd for PC, Mac, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Google Stadia. Pre-order now to receive the CLAAS XERION SADDLE TRAC Pack!

► https://farming-simulator.com/buy-now.php

► Farming Simulator Website: http://www.farming-simulator.com/ 
► Farming Simulator League Website: https://fsl.giants-software.com/
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/farmingsim
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/farmingsimulator/
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/giants.farming.simulator
► FSL Twitter: https://twitter.com/FSLeSports
► Discord: https://discord.gg/giantssoftware
► Twitch English: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftware
► Twitch Deutsch: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftwarede
► Get Farming Simulator 19 now on the official shop: https://www.farming-simulator.com/store.php
